tPxHrV8dfstkTfDh5.notes: +1 to all HT rolls to stay conscious, avoid death, resist disease, resist poison; recover FP at twice the normal rate (but not FP spent for spells or psi powers)

thD4QvwFzlGwZhzDQ.name: Fit, Very
thD4QvwFzlGwZhzDQ.notes: +2 to all HT rolls to stay conscious, avoid death, resist disease, resist poison; recover FP at twice the normal rate; lose FP at half the normal rate (in both cases, not FP spent for spells or psi powers)

TX9cZ3uzyujBPAjNV.name: Experienced
TX9cZ3uzyujBPAjNV.notes: Spend another 10 points on advantages. Exception: If you are normal-sized (below), the ST here costs 20 points, so don’t add the 2-point skill.

Trk79inl4kn27YDvy.name: Normal Sized
Trk79inl4kn27YDvy.notes: Remove Gigantism. Change ST to ST15 [50], Basic Move to 6, and SM to 0. Spend 5 fewer points on advantages, removing the size limitation from all options.

s11fxchtEfCHEyJOn.name: Judo
s11fxchtEfCHEyJOn.notes: Allows parrying two different attacks per turn, one with each hand.
